original_text: Men's hearts failing them for fear, and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth: for the powers of heaven shall be shaken.
korean_text: 사람들이 세상에 임할 일을 생각하고 무서워하므로 기절하리니 이는 하늘의 권능들이 흔들리겠음이라

sentences.original_text: Men's hearts failing them for fear
and for looking after those things
which are coming on the earth
for powers of heaven shall be shaken
